entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
